    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">¡Adiós, Cordera!</string>
            <string language="en">Goodbye, Cordera!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf Wiedersehen, Cordera!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au revoir, Cordera !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adeus, Cordera!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arrivederci, Cordera!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίο, Cordera!</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Guia de lectura interactiva del relat de Leopoldo Alas, "Clarín", en el qual es confronta el món rural idealitzat amb el progrés i la industrialització; també s'hi aborda la temàtica social. Consta de les següents seccions: "¿Quién lo ha escrito?" (amb informació sobre l'autor i enllaços), "Antes de leer" (amb indicacions prèvies a la lectura), "Comprensión" (amb un test autoavaluatiu de resposta múltiple) i "Después de leer" (amb exercicis interactius sobre lèxic, gramàtica i comprensió lectora).</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive reading guide for the novel by Leopoldo Alas, "Clarín", that confronts an idealised rural world with progress and industrialisation; as well as social issues. The guide has the following sections: "Who wrote it?" (information on the author and links), "Before reading" (pre-reading suggestions), "While reading" (multiple-choice self-assessment test), and "After reading" (interactive exercises on vocabulary, grammar and reading comprehension.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">segle XIX</string>
            <string language="en">19th century</string>
            <string language="es">siglo XIX</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">narració</string>
            <string language="en">narration</string>
            <string language="es">narración</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">conte</string>
            <string language="en">tale</string>
            <string language="es">cuento</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Leseanleitung für den Roman durch Leopoldo 
Alas, "Clarín", das eine idealisierte landwirtschaftliche Welt mit 
Fortschritt und Industrialisierung konfrontiert; sowie 
Sozialausgaben. Die Anleitung hat die folgenden Kapitel: 
"wer schrieb sie?" (Informationen über den Autor und die 
Links), "vor Messwert" (Vormesswertvorschläge), ", beim Ablesen" 
(Mehrfachwahl Selbstbewertung Test) und "nach Messwert" (interaktive 
Übungen auf Wortschatz-, Grammatik- und Leseerfassen.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guide interactif de lecture pour le roman par Leopoldo 
Alas, "Clarín", qui confronte un monde rural idéalisé avec le 
progrès et l'industrialisation ; aussi bien que les issues 
sociales. Le guide a les sections suivantes : "qui l'a 
écrit?" (l'information sur l'auteur et les liens), "avant la 
lecture" (suggestions de pré-lecture), "tout en lisant" (essai de 
multiple-choix art de l'auto-portrait-assessment), et "après la lecture" (exercices
interactifs sur la compréhension de vocabulaire, de grammaire et de 
lecture.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia interativa da leitura para a novela por Leopoldo 
Alas, "Clarín", que confronta um mundo rural idealised com o 
progresso e o industrialisation; as.well.as edições sociais. 
A guia tem as seguintes seções: "quem a escreveu?" 
(informação no autor e nas ligações), "antes da leitura" 
(sugestões da pre-leitura), "ao ler" (teste do self-assessment da 
múltiplo-escolha), e "após a leitura" (exercícios interativos na 
compreensão do vocabulário, da gramática e da leitura.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida interattiva della lettura per il romanzo da Leopoldo
Alas, "Clarín", che confronta un mondo rurale idealizzato con 
progresso e l'industrializzazione; così come le edizioni 
sociali. La guida ha le seguenti sezioni: "chi la ha 
scritta?" (le informazioni sull'autore e sui collegamenti), 
"prima di lettura" (suggerimenti della pre-lettura), "mentre leggendo"
(prova di valutazione di se stesso di multiplo-scelta) e "dopo la 
lettura" (esercitazioni interattive su comprensione di vocabolario, di
grammatica e della lettura.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός οδηγός ανάγνωσης για το μυθιστόρημα από το
Leopoldo Alas, "Clarνn", το οποίο αντιμετωπίζει έναν 
εξιδανικευμένο αγροτικό κόσμο με την πρόοδο και την εκβιομηχάνιση
όπως και τα κοινωνικά ζητήματα. Ο οδηγός έχει τα 
εξής τμήματα: "Ποιος τον έγραψε;" (πληροφορίες για το 
συντάκτη και τις συνδέσεις), "πρίν διαβάζει" (προτάσεις 
προανάγνωσης), "διαβάζοντασ" (πολλαπλής επιλογής δοκιμή 
αυτοαξιολόγησης), και "μετά από να διαβάσει" (διαλογικές 
ασκήσεις στο λεξιλόγιο, τη γραμματική και την ανάγνωση της 
κατανόησης.)</string>
          </description>
